review: My son was not sure of his career choices and I did not want to offer him to the coaching factories. I got his counselling and DMIT done and it has been a life-changer for us in knowing about his strengths, weaknesses and gave us the clarity we needed.

Great communication and services. The team thoroughly explained us about DMIT and how does it help. After it, we had an hour and half counselling session where to got to know so much about my children's brains, their innate talents, learning style personality. I am honestly very grateful to them for helping me make the right choices.
I highly recommend everyone to get their DMIT done. I am 47yos but I really wanted to know about my abilities and personality type. ................
